emr_vis_nlp.model

Class MpqaColonMainModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • emr_vis_nlp.model.MpqaColonMainModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MainModel

    public class MpqaColonMainModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements MainModel
    MainModel designed to represent the MPQA-style dataset (as referenced by XML doclist).
